channel.title: Need a cheap laptop
channel.description:
I don't care if it's still running a Centrino, or only has 512mb of RAM. I need something very cheap and easy to find. Any ideas?
Ebay listings would be great too.

item.title: Need a cheap laptop
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Mopman:

Defence contractors and suchlike write multiple times, with alternating patterns rather than just zeroing. Apparently you can recover even zerod drives with specialist hardware that picks up magnetic traces shrug

The specialist hardware is not invented yet, and the idea is stupid and would only work if the disk only was written on one time

Read full topic

item.title: Need a cheap laptop
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:9, topic:286409”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=378772.msg2850276#msg2850276 date=1246496606]

I’ll sell you this laptop cheap:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,376818.0.html
;D

Is that included your cookies?

No, I’d just format the drive, or install the original Vista or linux if desired.
[/quote]
you’d need to rewrite every block on the hdd about 8 times to be safe.[/quote]
One time writing 0’s to all blocks would be fine. Takes about 2 hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a cheap laptop
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

I had one of these but with 80gb and 768mb ram.
http://cgi.ebay.com/Compaq-Presario-X1000-15-4-Centrino-1-4-gb-40-512-Nice_W0QQitemZ190318346531QQcmdZViewItemQQptZAU_comp_laptop?hash=item2c4fdb8123&_trksid=p3286.c0.m14&_trkparms=65:12|66:2|39:1|72:1234|293:1|294:50

This boosted it, it could play FSX max settings at 1280x1024 20fps, Halo max settingsat 1280x1024 200fps, CS:S max settings 1280x1024 100fps.

And, I only payed $5nz for it (It had no keyboard)

Read full topic
